column4: Can anyone help me with the sound problem I have?  Sometimes a program will take sole control of the sound, and then I can't get other programs to play sound, even after quitting the program and restarting my sound server...
it means one of 2 things: a) pulseaudio isn't setup right, or b) you have a half-duplex soundcard.
its on a very recent laptop model and the pulse configuration is the default (and not everything goes through pulse either)
have you tried disabling pulse altogether?
